resources.string: You will be redirected to settings to grant permission
Inspection logs for the 24-hour periods and the previous days for one HOS cycle
Select \"Start Inspection\" and give your device to the officer
Send logs for the 24-hour periods and the previous days for one HOS cycle
Send your logs to the officer if they request
Email logs for the 24-hour periods and the previous days for one HOS cycle
Email your logs in the PDF format

VLOG ELD SOLUTIONS certifies that use of the VLOG ELD SOLUTIONS app with VLOG ELD device compiles\nwith all requirements for ELD as defined in Federal Motor Carrier Safety regulation 49 CRF part 395 Subpart B.
